thread.title: Report: Sandra Bullock Adopts a Baby Girl
thread.title_full: Report: Sandra Bullock Adopts a Baby Girl

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Report: Sandra Bullock Adopts a Baby Girl
text:
Comments It was claimed that Bullock has recently finalized the adoption of a baby girl and her boyfriend Bryan Randall will be involved in caring for the child. 
Sandra Bullock has a new addition into her clan, a baby girl. Radar Online has reported the movie beauty recently finalized the adoption of a baby girl and has brought the infant home to Los Angeles while she is taking time to take her out in public. The adopted baby girl will be joining Bullock's adopted son Louis. A source claimed her current boyfriend Bryan Randall will be involved in caring for the child. "Sandra's made it quite clear to Bryan from the start that she's looking for a husband to raise kids with," Radar Online quoted the source as saying. "She had the paperwork ready to adopt another child but really wanted to do it with the right man, and Bryan's been checking every box so far." "Everyone knows how terrified she is of giving her heart away again, but Bryan's incredibly supportive, loving and a brilliant father figure" for Louis, 5, added the source. "Sandra says he's perfect." Representative for Bullock has not yet responded to request for comment. The actress herself has yet to address the adoption report.
